pullRequest.body:
Shows that the quotient of a compact topological group by an open subgroup is finite.

---

PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

nodes.body:
### PR summary [4b704ea813](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16671/commits/4b704ea8138ad3ccfd285c3f15e6b797b79e706e)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ discreteTopology`
`+ instance [CompactSpace G] (N : Subgroup G) : CompactSpace (G ⧸ N)`
`+ instance [ContinuousMul G] (U : OpenSubgroup G) : DiscreteTopology (G ⧸ U.toSubgroup)`
`+ instance [ContinuousMul G] [CompactSpace G] (U : OpenSubgroup G) : Finite (G ⧸ U.toSubgroup)`
`+ instance [TopologicalGroup G] [CompactSpace G] (U : OpenSubgroup G) (K : OpenSubgroup U) :`
`+ isClosed_of_isOpen`
`+ quotient_finite_of_isOpen`
`+ quotient_finite_of_isOpen'`
`+ subgroupOf_isOpen`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10828085556/job/30042649558)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10828085556/job/30042648875)
Is this one not found automatically? Do you understand why?

I think the `CompactSpace` one is not found, because `G ⧸ U` is syntactically not the same as `Quotient (QuotientGroup.leftRel U)`, so
```lean
import Mathlib

variable (G : Type*) [Group G] [TopologicalSpace G] [ContinuousMul G] [CompactSpace G]
  (U : Subgroup G)

-- works
#synth CompactSpace (Quotient (QuotientGroup.leftRel U))

-- but this does not
#synth CompactSpace (G ⧸ U)

-- and this works again
example : CompactSpace (G ⧸ U) := inferInstanceAs <|
  CompactSpace (Quotient (QuotientGroup.leftRel U))
```

I think we should add
```
@[to_additive]
instance [CompactSpace G] (N : Subgroup G) : CompactSpace (G ⧸ N) :=
  Quotient.compactSpace
```
close to the definition of the topology on `G ⧸ N`.
Could you please add an `instance` variant for `U : OpenSubgroup G`?

Would it make sense to also turn this into an `instance` for the case `U K : OpenSubgroup G`? Or does the conclusion become quite ugly?

Orthogonally, does the following variant work for the appliation you have in mind?
```
@[to_additive]
lemma quotient_finite_of_isOpen'' [TopologicalGroup G] [CompactSpace G] (U : Subgroup G)
    (K : Subgroup U) (hUopen : IsOpen (U : Set G)) (hKopen : IsOpen (K : Set U)) :
    Finite (U ⧸ K) := by
  have : CompactSpace U := isCompact_iff_compactSpace.mp <| IsClosed.isCompact <|
    U.isClosed_of_isOpen hUopen
  apply K.quotient_finite_of_isOpen
  exact hKopen
```
Because it applies in situations where one isn't quotienting by something syntactically of the form `K.subgroupOf U`.
Ah yes, this is better and it should work modulo the newly added `Subgroup.subgroupOf_isOpen`.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Algebra/OpenSubgroup): quotient of compact group by open subgroup is finite
